tool_description: Validates RFP content against legal requirements, procurement regulations, and organizational policies to ensure compliance.

jurisdiction.description: Legal jurisdiction (US-Federal, US-State, EU, UK, Canada, etc.)

procurement_type.description: Type of procurement (public, private, government, nonprofit)

data_privacy_applicable.description: Whether data privacy regulations apply (GDPR, CCPA, etc.)

labor_standards_applicable.description: Whether labor standards and wage requirements apply

error_messages: Invalid jurisdiction: Specify a recognized legal jurisdiction code.
Unsupported procurement type: Use public, private, government, or nonprofit.
Invalid contract value: Contract value must be a positive number.
Unrecognized industry sector: Provide a valid industry classification.
Conflicting requirements: Some regulatory requirements may conflict with procurement type.
Missing mandatory clauses: Required legal clauses are missing for this jurisdiction and contract value.
usage: Specify jurisdiction, procurement_type, contract_value, and industry_sector. Set relevant boolean flags for specialized compliance requirements. The tool validates against applicable legal and regulatory frameworks.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, needs_review, or non_compliant

required_clauses.description: List of mandatory legal clauses to include

compliance_gaps.description: Identified compliance gaps that need addressing

risk_level.description: Legal risk assessment: low, medium, or high
